Posts.Content: jquesenberry wrote: Hey I haven't posted in a long time but heeeeere goes:   I've been using natural deodorants(no aluminums)since being diagnosed in 2005 . Lately I've noticed that ,quite frankly, I Stink!!!! Do you feel its safe to use anti perspirants? If not, how do you combat odor?(Especially in the hot summer months) Dx 5/13/2005, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 8/19 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: anti perspirant/breasr cancer link jquesenberry mawhinney

Posts.Content: jquesenberry wrote:   I had a mammagram on June 1 was called back for an ultrasound today because of an "area of  increased density " in my left breast.(my good one)Does this mean cancer?  At this point, no one wants to answer my questions. I'm frustrated and scared! Dx 5/13/2005, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 8/19 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
